patthana14.7:4.1: Sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.7:6.1: Sappaccayo dhammo naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana14.7:7.1: Appaccayo dhammo naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana14.7:8.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve … pe … upanissaye dve … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
